```{r}
base_data <- readRDS(file='C:/Users/divya/OneDrive/Documents/Duke/MIDS/Semester 1/IDS 702 - Modeling and Representation of Data/Group_Project_Traffic_Crashes/Resources/df_cleaned_chicago_crashes.rds')

```

```{r}
model <- lm(police_notified_time ~
              #crash_date +
              hr_of_day +
              day_of_week +
              month_of_year +
              speed_limit +
              #weather_condition +
              trafficway_type +
              roadway_surface_cond +
              #num_units +
              dist_to_dt +
              temp +
              precipitation +
              snow +
              snowdepth +
              windspeed +
              visibility 
              #damage_class
              , data = base_data)
summary(model)
```
